document.full_text: dozens of people who were blinded or otherwise suffered severe eye damage when they were splashed with caustic chemicals had their sight restored with transplants of their own stem cells, italian researchers reported wednesday.
document.title: stem cells reverse blindness caused by chemical burns
lines_and_colors: dozens of people who were blinded or otherwise suffered severe eye damage when they were splashed with caustic chemicals had their sight restored with transplants of their own stem cells, italian researchers reported wednesday.
